sense.def:
Kadar človek
negotiates an agreement
, doseže sporazum v pogajanjih z drugimi.

seg.quote: He negotiated a trade agreement with Brazil.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
negotiates for something
, poskuša tisto doseči v pogajanjih z drugimi.

cit.quote: pogajati se za, dogovarjati se za

seg.quote: Paul is negotiating for a job worth £18,000.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
negotiates an obstacle
, uspešno obide oviro ali se ji izogne.

seg.quote: Patrick is not sure whether he can negotiate the turn at the bottom.
